[ApRow form_id="form_10227272769294892" class="row box-banner-text-fullwidth" bg_config="boxed" bg_type="normal" bg_repeat="no-repeat" parallax_speed="0.1" parallax_axis="both" parallax_strength="0.5" parallax_rid="0.5" parallax_hoffsets="0.1" parallax_voffsets="0.1" animation="none" animation_delay="2" specific_type="all" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApColumn form_id="form_4471615003106551" lg="12" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" sp="12" specific_type="" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApImage form_id="form_9907541672478364" animation="none" animation_delay="0.5" css_class="banner-text img-left align-center-text justify-right-text" is_open="0" width="auto" height="auto" override_folder="image-text" title="Collezione corrente" image="banner-2-1.png" url="#" description="

Con i cambiamenti climatici su di noi, è fondamentale per preparare responsabile: ecologica in grado di adattarsi al clima mercuriale. Vi presento, la mia collezione primavera del 2016.

_APENTER_

IT’S OFFICIAL: BELT BAGS
ARE BACK

_APENTER_

The most polarizing bag of the 90s is back with a vengeance. Carrie Bradshaw’s go-to fanny pack showed up on the Alexander Wang Pre-Fall 2016.

_APENTER_

YA ES OFICIAL: BOLSAS DE CINTURÓN
ESTÁN DE VUELTA

_APENTER_

La bolsa más polarizante de los años 90 está de vuelta con una venganza. Ir a riñonera de Carrie Bradshaw demostró para arriba en el Alexander Wang pre-otoño 2016.

content_html="
_APENTER_

من المسؤول: أكياس حزام
وعاد

_APENTER_

حقيبة الاستقطاب الأكثر التسعينات عاد مع انتقام. وأظهرت الذهاب إلى حزمة كاري برادشو فإني في 2016 ألكسندر وانغ قبل الخريف.

_APENTER_اكتشف الآن_APENTER_

params.en:
[ApRow form_id="form_8876555821795077" class="row box-banner-image" bg_config="boxed" bg_type="normal" bg_repeat="no-repeat" parallax_speed="0.1" parallax_axis="both" parallax_strength="0.5" parallax_rid="0.5" parallax_hoffsets="0.1" parallax_voffsets="0.1" animation="none" animation_delay="2" specific_type="all" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApColumn form_id="form_7250314661378011" lg="8" md="7" sm="6" xs="6" sp="12" animation="none" animation_delay="2" specific_type="all" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApImage form_id="form_2368804248715913" animation="none" animation_delay="0.5" alt="" css_class="banner-text img-left align-bottom-text justify-right-text" is_open="0" width="auto" height="auto" override_folder="image-text" title="New Look" image="banner-text-1-1.png" url="#" description="

Originally designed in 1959, it’s back for 2016 in colors and

_APENTER_

fabrics you’ll only find here.

_APENTER_

IT’S OFFICIAL: BELT BAGS
ARE BACK

_APENTER_

The most polarizing bag of the 90s is back with a vengeance. Carrie Bradshaw’s go-to fanny pack showed up on the Alexander Wang Pre-Fall 2016.

SIND ZURÜCK

_APENTER_
